description:
Spring has arrived, and Myne is raring to go make clay tablets in the forest. But first, she must convince her family that she can handle the journey.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hajimete no Mori to Nendo Saka
Première excursion en forêt et tablettes d’argile
Zum ersten Mal im Wald und Tontafel
